# CMSampleBuffer.TimingPerSample

**Enumeration**

Specifies timing of each sample in a sample buffer.

## Declaration

```swift
enum TimingPerSample
```

## Enumeration Cases

- **CMSampleBuffer.TimingPerSample.distinct(_:)**: Each sample has distinct timing.
- **CMSampleBuffer.TimingPerSample.sequential(startingAt:)**: All samples are adjacent to each other and have the same duration.

## Type Methods

- **sequential(presentationTimeOfFirstSample:uniformDuration:decodeTimeOfFirstSample:)**: All samples are adjacent to each other and have the same duration.

## Conforms To

- Copyable
- Equatable
- ExpressibleByArrayLiteral
- Sendable
- SendableMetatype
